text_block_list.text:
It's the start of a new year, and<n>Winning Ticket, Biwa
Hayahide, and<n>Narita Taishin are visiting the shrine to<n>
make their first prayer of the year.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa! Look at all these people!<n>New Year's around here
is like the<n>Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Just look, it's super crowded, right?<n>Same as the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: You make everything about the<n>Derby.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Soon she'll be telling us how a<n>washing machine is like the
Derby.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Anyway, all three of you did really<n>well last year.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Anyway, all three of you did really<n>well last year.

After Winning Ticket's first win, she<n>clinched another two
for a three-win<n>streak. Her rivals racked up some<n>nice
results too.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I wish I could've gotten Top Junior<n>though...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I was hoping I could too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: No way, you'd start bawling at the<n>awards ceremony.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wait, could that be why I didn't get<n>picked?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You're all almost at the Classics. You<n>should be proud.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You're all almost at the Classics. You<n>should be proud.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! First the Satsuki Sho, then theJapanese Derby, and the Kikuka Sho!But especially the derby!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's an honor to win any of them...<n>And I want that honor
more than<n>anything.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeeeah, let's pray on it! I wish to win<n>the Yayoi Sho and
move right on to the<n>Classics!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and, and! I wanna race together<n>with Taishin and
Hayahide! The end!

The friendly rivals work hard together<n>toward the goal
they've had since<n>they first became classmates—to run<n>in
the same race.

And that race is approaching faster<n>than they could've
imagined.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Extra, extra!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Read all about it! Not only is Tickezo<n>racing in the Yayoi Sho,
Taishin will<n>now too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Taishin too?! Waaah! Our time to race<n>together's finally
cooome!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Eheheh. You shouldn't be all too<n>pleased. Everyone's been
talking<n>about how good Taishin's looking.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah! All the more reason I need to<n>step it up!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer! I wanna shorten the<n>time I need to go from
zero to top<n>speed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nice. You're thinking more concretely.<n>That means you've
been using your<n>head when you train.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Nice. You're thinking more concretely.<n>That means you've
been using your<n>head when you train.

The rivalry she has with Biwa<n>Hayahide and Narita Taishin
is<n>pushing Ticket to enhance her game.

Surely Ticket is pushing her rivals too.<n>We'll need to be in
top shape for this<n>race—not just for Ticket's sake, but<n>for
Taishin's as well.
choice_data_list: Get ready to give it all you've got!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Right! Bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
We're here today at the Yayoi Sho!<n>The racers are now
making their way<n>onto the track!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey! We're all walking the runners'<n>tunnel together,
Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Quit yelling, the echo's crazy down<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you two never change.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Cause we're rivals! And rivals are<n>friends for life!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Quit it with that!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
It does feel special to be running with<n>you, but this doesn't
change anything<n>for me.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I'm still gonna go all out to win this.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I feel the same way! Running with<n>each other isn't the
goal—I've gotta<n>win!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'll be watching you two out there.<n>Make me proud to be
your rival.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You got it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Right, here I go.

The Yayoi Sho—the first showdown<n>between friends—begins
amid<n>resounding fanfare.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Which runner has what it takes to win<n>the Yayoi Sho?!
They're in the starting<n>gate...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And they're off!
